text:
A breakdown of cases by state can be found via https://t.co/zQrpNeOfet

#TakeResponsibility https://t.co/ZSKQglSDNX

urls.title: NCDC Coronavirus COVID-19 Microsite
urls.description: From 9th to 11th April 2022, 27 new confirmed cases were recorded in Nigeria Till date, 255,633 cases have been confirmed, 249,825 cases have been discharged and 3,142 deaths have been recorded in 36 states and the Federal Capital Territory The 27 new cases are reported from 6 States- Lagos (18), FCT (4), Delta (2), Kaduna (1), Oyo (1) and Rivers (1) A multi-sectoral national emergency operations centre (EOC), activated at Level 2, continues to coordinate the national response activities
